author: senh
title: Colts still seeking solutions for Patriots' ground game
text: BING NEWS: Colts Still Seeking Solutions for Patriots' Ground Game The Colts defense knows all about the ugly numbers. Indianapolis has faced New England four times in the past three years. Each time, the Colts' defense was run over. Each time, Indianapolis read the stats, endured the film sessions and searched for answers. 10/16/2015 - 7:13 am | View Link Colts save their season Well, the Indy D came up with a big stop early in the fourth, and got a huge interception while Luck threw two touchdown passes and Frank Gore counted one on the ground. Indy scored ... They're patients at Riley Hospital for Children. They got to attend the show with a professional football player, Colts ... 09/17/2015 - 12:39 am | View Link Patriots head to Super Bowl with 45-7 win over Colts FOXBOROUGH, Massachusetts — Tom Brady fired three touchdown passes and LeGarrette Blount rumbled for three more as the New England Patriots demolished the Indianapolis ... Blount was grinding it out on the ground, rushing for 148 yards on 30 carries ... 01/18/2015 - 2:11 pm | View Link Addai, Colts confident in underappreciated running game Indy's hierarchy then spent the offseason seeking solutions. Team president Bill Polian used his ... and coach Jim Caldwell insisted the ground game had to get better throughout the offseason. In August, Caldwell reinforced his point by making a change.
